segments.text: What are your thoughts on the apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that it ’ s absolutely gorgeous .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There aren ’ t any problems with the apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that the apartment looks very nice , but I do see some problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I did notice a few stains in the carpet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will have the carpet cleaned before you move in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but other than that , are there any more problems ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That was the only thing that I saw that was wrong with the apartment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m happy that you find this apartment so appealing .
segments.speaker: S1
